name: Slimes Together Strong?
description:
Cute Slimes From All Around The Forest Have United To Kill You. But will their unity be enough? Or are they gonna get clapped by a Hooman and One Pink Slime Boi. Find out in the next episode of... Woah woah!

Instructions:

Pink Slime Good.

All other slimes Bad.

We got REGULAR SLIME, MOMMA SLIME and BOSS SLIME (Totally not a bulbasaur ripoff) in game who are out for blood.

Pink Boi Heals You (Hold E) and Protecc you with Shield (Hold Q). (Both abilities have no limits so feel free to go ham).

WASD - Move, Space - Jump, LMB - Fire Bullets, Use those Trees to your Advantage.

If you see something shiny.... maybe go check it out

The Game does NOT support Controllers.

If Boxes Get Stuck or You Got inside them... just restart the level :P

There's no sound? Yeah... most probably ran out of time.

Idk if I implemented Mouse Sensitivity. So if you didn't find it in settings... maybe I ran out of time.

This Game Was Tested on:

Laptop with Intel Core i5 7200U and Nvidia GeForce 940mx. So a potato computer shouldn't have any issues running it... I guess.

Oh one more thing... The whole game is made with BOLT Visual Scripting. (In case you wondered)
